name: Amazing!
overview: Published as a type-in game in Page 6 Magazine, Amazing! is an arcade puzzler where your goal is to help Excephorous II to prolong his life and succeed in his quest by collectingdiamonds and avoiding those pesky lightningn bolts. All you have to do is move our little friend from the bottom right of the screen to the top left, but the further you go the harder It will be to avoid those bolts of lightning. Those lightning bolts use up the oxygen in the underground caverns so you only have a certain amount of time to find the exit and a rising warning alarm only adds to the tension. It can get rather fraught at times.
